set(SDL_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR} CACHE INTERNAL "SDL directory")
set(SDL_INCLUDE ${SDL_DIR}/include CACHE INTERNAL "SDL includes")
set(SDL_LIB ${SDL_DIR}/lib/${TARGET_PLATFORM}/SDL2.lib CACHE INTERNAL "SDL library path")
set(SDL_MAIN_LIB ${SDL_DIR}/lib/${TARGET_PLATFORM}/SDL2main.lib CACHE INTERNAL "SDL main library path")
set(SDL_DLL ${SDL_DIR}/lib/${TARGET_PLATFORM}/SDL2.dll CACHE INTERNAL "SDL dll")

# Copy SDL DLL to target directory
file(COPY ${SDL_DLL} DESTINATION ${CMAKE_RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY})

# Install SDL dll
install(FILES ${SDL_DLL} DESTINATION ${INSTALL_BIN} COMPONENT runtime)
